en: This dialogue is localized using a .csv file.
ja: I still don't speak japanese but you get the text that i specified in the .csv file for japanese.

en: The names of the speakers and also the options can be translated.
ja: Look at my name. Did you know that Charlemange is called "Karl der Große" in german? (literally Karl the great / big)

en: Variables in the translated text are replaced. Therefore i can access the TEST_VAR variable: {{TEST_VAR}}.
ja: Even here i can access TEST_VAR: {{TEST_VAR}}.

en: Variables of the type string are also translated. TEST_STRING: {{TEST_STRING}}
ja: Still no japanese but at least variable gets translated. TEST_STRING: {{TEST_STRING}}
I wish i could speak japanese but sadly i can't.
